price: But the one who came with the truth [i.e., the prophet] and [those who] believed in it, it is they who are the righteous.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
